name: Parting Rays
description:
Thine heart, which pulses like a radiant star - would you like to grasp its rhythm?

A point-and-click online rhythm game where you ricochet off walls to forge your own rhythms and destinies. 

CONTROLS InputAim trajectoryPoint mouse cursorMute songM Lower volume,Increase volume. CREDITS

Song track: All the times by fizzd

Permission has been received by the composer for the song to be used in the game.
